Literature.Title: Toxicity study of antimicrobial peptides from wild bee venom and their analogs toward mammalian normal and cancer cells.
Literature.Author: Slaninová J, Mlsová V, Kroupová H, Alán L, Tumová T, Monincová L, Borovicková L, Fucík V, Cerovský V

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>200 µM,Human umbilical vein endothelial cells HUVEC:IC50=>100 µM,Rat epithelial cells IEC-6, CRL-1592:IC50=>100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Human cervical carcinoma HeLa S3(IC50=>100µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma SW480(IC50=>100µM),Human lymphoblastic leukemia CCRF-CEM(IC50=32µM)
